betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Yes, the 'prison' that the Eldritch creatures placed on me affects the way I interface with reality.
I felt it within myself, a trace, a path that, I believe, will lead me home. I can prime a wormhole towards coordinates I think will lead me to Earth.
And yet, I am stopped in this pursuit. A wall has been placed around me, blocking me from doing the wrong thing, this much is evident.
I can but scratch this wall, and while all I can get out of it is fragments of this prison, I know that, with enough time, I may be able to reverse engineer it.
This is the first time I encountered such a hard limitation in what I can do... except dying of course. Because of this, I can assume that the intentions of the one who imprisoned me, at least for the time being, align with my current goals.
I should be wary of this, and test these barriers more and more, whenever I encounter them.
